item.title: Study: Rate Of Serious Or Life-Threatening Complications After Abortion Pill Is 22 Times Higher Than FDA Claims
item.description: ‘Women deserve better than the abortion pill,’ the researchers conclude.

item.title: SCOTUS’s Refusal To End Leftists’ Judicial Coup Is Damaging Its Credibility More Than The Media Ever Could
item.description: By refusing to rein in the lower courts' lawlessness, SCOTUS has greenlit a judicial coup that is stymying the will of 77 million Americans.
